title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Mobile Web-Based Mathematics Learning Design: A Case Study Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics knowledge, experience with web-based learning tools, and understanding of basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design math concept explanation content optimized for mobile environments based on case studies
Learners can develop math learning modules that operate across diverse device environments by applying responsive web technology
Learners can enhance the usability of the mathematics problem-solving process by applying User Experience (UX) principles, achieving at least a 20% improvement
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
